description:
http://anidb.net/ch7215 [Naegino Sora] is a 16 year old girl who yearns for the "Kaleido Stage" she once saw with her now deceased parents. And so, alone she sets off to America from Japan to go for an audition.
However, Sora arrives at the audition late and misses her chance of a lifetime... But that is just the start of the challenges that she must face to become a top entertainer. As she works hard on beautiful stages and goes through times of discouragement, the conscience of a professional awakens in her.

REGULAR.description:
Sora dreams of becoming a star of the Kaleido Stage, but when a scumbag steals her luggage and makes her miss the only audition of the year, it will take a miracle - or an accident - for her dream to come true!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 初めての! すごい! ステージ

REGULAR.description:
Sora is given one week to learn the death-defying Golden Phoenix: the signature move of the Kaleido Stage’s leading lady. If she fails, she’ll be forced to pack up and return home forever!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 孤独な すごい チャレンジ

REGULAR.description:
The Kaleido Stage is putting on a fabulous production of Cinderella, but instead of performing on stage, Sora is forced to dress up like a clown and hand out toys during intermission. Can she contain her disappointment?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 遠い すごい ステージ

REGULAR.description:
Sora gets a second chance to appear in the upcoming production of Cinderella, but she’ll need to master a daring, three-person technique known as the Triple Illusion to earn a spot on stage.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Si on s`accroche, on reçoit une chance inouïe
Try Hard and You`ll Get an Amazing Chance
がんばれば すごい チャンス

REGULAR.description:
Sora and her friends are stung by their failures on stage and a nasty review in the local paper. As if things couldn’t get any worse, Sora’s dad is about to pay her a visit, and he’s no fan of her Kaleido Stage shenanigans.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: いつも すごい 遠い家族

REGULAR.description:
Pets may be forbidden in her dorm, but when Sora stumbles upon an abandoned seal, she can’t resist the urge to bring the little guy home with her! Does her new pet have what it takes to be a new breed of Kaleido Star?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 小さくて すごい オットセイ

REGULAR.description:
When a Diablo prodigy blows her big shot at becoming a Kaleido Stage regular, Sora is given the task of helping the young girl rediscover her love of performing!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La fille étonnante qui ne sourit pas
The Amazing Girl Who Doesn`t Smile
笑わない すごい 少女

REGULAR.description:
Layla appears to have everything a girl could want. She’s rich, she’s gorgeous, and she’s the biggest star in the Kaleido Stage universe! But when her dad misses her birthday, it’ll take Sora to cheer her up!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An Amazing Star Even in Tough Times
Même quand elle souffre, c`est une merveilleuse star
つらくても すごい スター

REGULAR.description:
When Sora suffers a devastating fall during an audition for the new, mermaid-themed production, she’ll need the help of a close friend and a martial arts expert to regain her competitive edge!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le grand challenge pour le rôle principal
My Amazing Challenge for the Lead Role
主役への すごい 挑戦

REGULAR.description:
Sora finally landed the part that could make her wildest dreams come true, but if she can’t figure out a way to breathe new life into the role of a broken-hearted mermaid, her days as a leading lady will be numbered!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: El reto de un papel principal
Le grand mur devant le premier rôle
主役への すごい 壁

REGULAR.description:
Painful memories from Anna’s childhood resurface when her dad - a struggling standup comedian - performs at a local comedy club. Can this father-daughter duo find a way to laugh at the past?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le père, loin d`être formidable, d`Anna
Mi padre ya no es el mismo de antes
アンナの すごくない お父さん

REGULAR.description:
Sora has always idolized Layla, and now, she’s got a chance to star alongside her hero in the newest Kaleido Stage production. There’s just one thing standing in her way: a flaming tightrope of doom!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Un chaud et fantastique nouveau spectacle
熱い すごい 新作

REGULAR.description:
Layla moves in with Sora so the two leading ladies can learn to perform as one. When conventional training proves useless, the girls take their routine to the high seas and put on a show in the middle of a storm!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La fantástica competición que desata una tormenta
La terrible concurrence qui appelle la tempête
The Amazing Competition Calls Up a Storm
嵐を呼ぶ すごい 競演

REGULAR.description:
When Sora is sent on a special assignment to perform with a travelling circus, she learns a valuable lesson about making the audience happy - no matter what role you have to play.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 怪しい すごい サーカス

REGULAR.description:
Sarah is courted by a music producer who wants to make her a star, but Sora can’t understand why she’d want to leave Kaleido Stage - or how Kalos could let her go.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: El fantástico amor de una cantante
Le grand amour de la cantatrice
歌姫の すごい 愛

REGULAR.description:
A bossy friend from Japan makes Sora nervous when she pays the Kaleido Star a surprise visit. Meanwhile, rumors about a possible Kaleido closing put the cast on edge.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 黒い すごい 噂

REGULAR.description:
Mia is given one week to write the show that will save Kaleido Stage, and Yuri finally tells Sora the painful motive behind his attempt to sabotage the man who made him a star.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 燃えろ! すごい ミア

REGULAR.description:
Mia’s new show is a hit with the audience, but Kaleido Stage isn’t out of the woods, yet. Now that Yuri’s in charge, Sora and her friends must prepare for what could be their last performance ever.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La fantástica trampa del joven Yuri
ユーリの すごい 罠

REGULAR.description:
Sora’s search for a new place to live is interrupted by big news from Japan: her parents are going to have a baby! Will this new addition to her family put an end to the leading lady’s performing career?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 家族の すごい 絆

REGULAR.description:
Miss Sarah lands the girls a gig at an amusement park, and Sora reassembles the old gang for one more shot at stardom! When the show finally starts, a masked performer swoops in and steals the spotlight!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An Amazing Change from Zero to Hero
ゼロからの すごい スタート

REGULAR.description:
Thanks to the masked acrobat, Sora and her friends are offered a contract at the amusement park. There’s just one problem: the park owner wants the mysterious performer center stage, but no one knows who she is!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La fantastique et mystérieuse star masquée
謎の すごい 仮面スター

REGULAR.description:
Yuri sabotages the Freedom Lights performance company, forcing them to travel to Canada for a fresh start. Layla wants to be there for her friends, but will she risk disappointing her father?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kamen no Shita no Sugoi Kakugo
La grande résolution sous le masque
The Amazing Resolve Beneath the Mask
仮面の下の すごい 覚悟

REGULAR.description:
With a little help from The Fool, Layla and Sora hatch a plan to beat Yuri at his own game. If they can learn the Legendary Great Maneuver in one month, Kalos will regain control of Kaledio Stage!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 幻の すごい 大技

REGULAR.description:
Layla and Sora continue their super-intensive training as they prepare to attempt the death-defying Legendary Great Maneuver, but when Sora’s confidence is shaken, it could spell the end for them both!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: まだ続く すごい 特訓

REGULAR.description:
The girls return to Kaledio Stage to continue rehearsing for the Legendary Great Maneuver, but after a heated argument with Yuri, Layla is no longer able to hide her devastating injury!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ふたりの すごい 絆

REGULAR.description:
Despite her very serious injury, Layla is determined to give the greatest performance of her life! All she needs is Sora by her side - and a little help from the mischievous Fool!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 傷だらけの すごい 復活

REGULAR.description:
Fool, the mysterious spirit of the theater, narrates this stirring recap of Sora’s initiation into the high-flying world of Kaleido Stage!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: El Fantástico Prólogo del Estrellato (Primera parte)
The Amazing Prologue to Stardom, Part 1
スターへの すごい プロローグ (前編)

REGULAR.description:
Fool continues the recap of Sora’s early days with Kaleido Stage, including her partnership with Layla and her daring performance of the Legendary Great Maneuver.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: El Fantástico Prólogo del Estrellato (Segunda parte)
The Amazing Prologue to Stardom, Part 2
スターへの すごい プロローグ (後編)

REGULAR.description:
After Layla retires, Sora feels added pressure to perform under the spotlight, and it doesn’t help that Kaleido Stage’s newest leading man is giving her the cold shoulder!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 新しい すごい ライバル

REGULAR.description:
Layla’s plans to win over Leon - and her fiery new rival - by throwing a welcome party are interrupted by a surprise visit from the young diablo champion, Rosetta!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: もう一人の すごい 新人

REGULAR.description:
Sora and May both want to star alongside Leon in the new vampire-themed production, but there’s only room for one leading lady. Whoever can master the deadly screw spin first will win the role of a lifetime!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La fantástica pasión de una rival
情熱の すごい ライバル

REGULAR.description:
The fierce competition between Sora and May shifts from the high wire to the skating rink as the determined performers vie for the right to play Leon’s love interest in the new show!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Koori no Ue no Sugoi Taiketsu
Le grand duel sur la glace
氷の上の すごい 対決

REGULAR.description:
Rosetta has three days to become a high-flying trapeze artist, or she’ll have to quit Kaleido Stage. Lucky for her, she’s got Sora for a teacher!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Amazing Rosetta of Sweat and Tears
Ase to Namida no Sugoi Rosetta
De la sueur et des larmes pour la merveilleuse Rosetta
汗と涙の すごい ロゼッタ

REGULAR.description:
Sora’s all set for an off-Broadway reunion with the great Layla Hamilton, but May bursts onto the scene with intentions to steal the show. Can Sora recover her competitive edge in time to shine on stage?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: やっぱり すごい レイラさん

REGULAR.description:
Sora and her friends are determined to build an amazing stage just for kids, but first they must convince Marion to return to the high-flying life of a trampoline artist!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: マリオンの すごい デビュー

REGULAR.description:
May and Sora compete for the honor of performing alongside Leon at the International Circus Festival, but the surly trapeze artist’s special training could destroy them both!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: El fantástico entrenamiento con el joven Leon
レオンとの すごい 特訓

REGULAR.description:
A moment’s hesitation threatens to ruin Sora’s chances of performing at the International Circus Festival, and May tries to get back in the game by inventing a devilish new maneuver!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 二人の すごい 悪魔

REGULAR.description:
Sora is crushed when Leon chooses May as his partner, but her dreams of competing in the International Circus Festival may not be dead yet. A handsome face from her past has the power to fix everything!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 天使の すごい 反撃

REGULAR.description:
Yuri and Sora are working hard to get ready for the performance of a lifetime, but will Sora’s lack of fundamentals - and a pair of cutthroat competitors - spoil their chances at victory?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 惨酷な すごい 祭典

REGULAR.description:
After her embarrassing performance at the International Circus Festival, Sora runs away from Kaleido Stage and moves back in with her parents. Can a heart-to-heart chat with an old friend convince her not to give up on her dreams?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Un fantástico y triste regreso a casa
絶望の すごい 帰国

REGULAR.description:
Sora returns to Kaleido Stage with a new dream: creating a competition-free show that everyone can enjoy! Unfortunately, May and Leon have other plans for the former leading lady.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La grande décision de tout recommencer
再出発の すごい 決意

REGULAR.description:
Leon’s strange behavior continues as he mistakes Sora for a mysterious woman from his past. When he drags her into the spotlight mid-performance, a tragic accident shocks the audience!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 屈辱の すごい 共演

REGULAR.description:
Ken finally finds the courage to ask Sora out on a date, but his plan to win her heart is interrupted by a lovesick police man and the world’s most unlucky bank robber!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La surprenante demande de M. le policier
ポリスの すごい プロポーズ

REGULAR.description:
A performance at a car dealership gets Sora back on stage, May learns the importance of a smile, and Rosetta makes her long-awaited trapeze debut!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: El fantástico poder de una sonrisa
笑顔の すごい 発進!

REGULAR.description:
The Kaleido Stage crew travels to Paris, and Rosetta begins working with a mysterious trapeze teacher. When the aging master reveals the truth about Leon’s past, Sora becomes determined to perfect the Angel’s Manuever!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: レオンの すごい 過去

REGULAR.description:
Sora lands the starring role in Kaleido Stage’s new production of Swan Lake, but her leading man has yet to be determined. Yuri and Leon draw swords and take to the air as they battle for the right to fly alongside her!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Una fantástica pelea creada por el destino
宿命の すごい 決斗

REGULAR.description:
Sora’s doubts about her ability to perfect the Angel’s Maneuver are put to rest by a chance meeting with a special seeing-eye dog and a former Kaleido Star!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: El fantástico ángel que bajo del escenario
Le merveilleux ange qui est tombé
舞い降りた すごい 天使

REGULAR.description:
A lack of balance threatens to derail Sora’s attempt to perfect the Angel’s Maneuver, and Leon is ready to throw in the towel. Will the leading lady give up on her dream - or push her body to the breaking point?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 傷ついた すごい 白鳥

REGULAR.description:
While Sora and Leon continue their special training, May and Rosetta form an unlikely partnership. Meanwhile, a face from the past emerges from the shadows to steal Sora’s spotlight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: El fantástico futuro que nos espera
ひとりひとりの すごい 未来[あした]

REGULAR.description:
The great Layla Hamilton returns to the stage to challenge Sora for the privilege of performing the Angel’s Maneuver in the upcoming production of Swan Lake!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Most Amazing and Inescapable Showdown
El fantástico combate de Sora y Layla
避けられない ものすごい 一騎討ち

REGULAR.description:
Opening night has arrived, and Sora takes the stage on a mission to make her wildest dreams come true. If she successfully performs the Angel’s Maneuver, she’ll finally be a true Kaleido Star!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: El fantástico camino hacia la tierra prometida
Vers le merveilleux lieu de la promesse
約束の すごい 場所へ
